Weighing common patterns

04 Apr 2016 | objective-c 
         ^
         | D
Verbose  |
         |       B
         |              N
         |
         |                              K
Subtle   ------------------------------------->

D = Delegate patterns
B = Block patterns
N = Notifications
K = Key Value Observation

You can find real explanations and how to use them in this objc.io article.

This post will - in an effort to be useful - demonstrate misuses and potential problems.

You can expect that patterns options will be more work upfront, where subtle patterns lend themselves to misuse.

Delegate Patterns
